client.apis.v1_1_0.credit_clear_income 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : credit_clear_income.py
@Author      : wst
@Time        : 2022/4/11 下午4:54
@Description : 清分应收相关功能
"""

from rest_framework.generics import ListAPIView

from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate
from client.serializers.credit_clear_income import (
    CreditClearIncomeUndoSerializer, CreditClearIncomeDoneSerializer,
    CapitalCreditClearIncomeUndoSerializer, CapitalCreditClearIncomeDoneSerializer
)
from client.filters.credit_clear_income import CreditClearIncomeUndoFilter, CapitalCreditClearIncomeUndoFilter
from utils.drf.paginations import MyPageNumberPagination



[文档]class CreditClearIncomeUndoView(ListAPIView):
    serializer_class = CreditClearIncomeUndoSerializer
    filter_class = CreditClearIncomeUndoFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination


[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        """ 获取初始数据集
        注意：这里为未清分的，即在清分记录表中不存在
        @return:
        """
        return CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
            company=self.request.company,
            review_status='pass',
            creditcleardetail__isnull=True
        ).order_by('-id')




[文档]class CreditClearIncomeDoneView(CreditClearIncomeUndoView):
    serializer_class = CreditClearIncomeDoneSerializer


[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        """ 获取初始数据集
        注意： 这里为已清分的，需要在清分记录表中存在
        @return:
        """
        return CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
            company=self.request.company,
            review_status='pass',
            creditcleardetail__isnull=False
        ).order_by('-id')




[文档]class CapitalCreditClearIncomeUndoView(CreditClearIncomeUndoView):
    serializer_class = CapitalCreditClearIncomeUndoSerializer
    filter_class = CapitalCreditClearIncomeUndoFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination




[文档]class CapitalCreditClearIncomeDoneView(CreditClearIncomeDoneView):
    serializer_class = CapitalCreditClearIncomeDoneSerializer
    filter_class = CapitalCreditClearIncomeUndoFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination
